00036 require_once('../lib/vars.php');
00037 require_once('../lib/view.php');
00038 
00039 class Clamd extends View
00040 {
00041     public $Model= 'clamd';
00042 
00043     public $Layout= 'clamd';
00044 
00045     function Clamd()
00046     {
00047         $this->LogsHelpMsg= _HELPWINDOW('Clamd logs virus scan results, virus database checks, and database reloads.');
00048         $this->GraphHelpMsg= _HELPWINDOW('Since Freshclam wakes up periodically, this page displays graphs for Clamd process only.');
00049         $this->ConfHelpMsg= _HELPWINDOW('By default, Clamd accepts virus scan requests from processes running on the system only, such as the web filter. Default settings should be suitable for most purposes.');
00050     
00051         $this->Config = array(
00052             'LogClean' => array(
00053                 'title' => _TITLE2('Log Clean'),
00054                 'info' => _HELPBOX2('Also log clean files. Useful in debugging but drastically increases the log size.
00055         Default: disabled'),
00056                 ),
00057             'LogVerbose' => array(
00058                 'title' => _TITLE2('Log Verbose'),
00059                 'info' => _HELPBOX2('Enable verbose logging.
00060         Default: disabled'),
00061                 ),
00062             'MaxThreads' => array(
00063                 'title' => _TITLE2('Max Threads'),
00064                 'info' => _HELPBOX2('Maximal number of threads running at the same time.
00065         Default: 10'),
00066                 ),
00067             'MaxDirectoryRecursion' => array(
00068                 'title' => _TITLE2('Max Directory Recursion'),
00069                 'info' => _HELPBOX2('Maximal depth directories are scanned at.
00070         Default: 15'),
00071                 ),
00072             'FollowDirectorySymlinks' => array(
00073                 'title' => _TITLE2('Follow Directory Symlinks'),
00074                 'info' => _HELPBOX2('Follow directory symlinks.
00075         Default: disabled'),
00076                 ),

00078                 'title' => _TITLE2('Follow File Symlinks'),
00079                 'info' => _HELPBOX2('Follow regular file symlinks.
00080         Default: disabled'),
00081                 ),
00082             'SelfCheck' => array(
00083                 'title' => _TITLE2('Self Check'),
00084                 'info' => _HELPBOX2('Perform internal sanity check (database integrity and freshness).
00085         Default: 1800 (30 min)'),
00086                 ),
00087             'Debug' => array(
00088                 'title' => _TITLE2('Debug'),
00089                 'info' => _HELPBOX2('Enable debug messages in libclamav.
00090         Default: disabled'),
00091                 ),
00092             'LeaveTemporaryFiles' => array(
00093                 'title' => _TITLE2('Leave Temporary Files'),
00094                 'info' => _HELPBOX2('Do not remove temporary files (for debug purposes).
00095         Default: disabled'),
00096                 ),
00097             'ScanPE' => array(
00098                 'title' => _TITLE2('Scan PE'),
00099                 'info' => _HELPBOX2('PE stands for Portable Executable - it\'s an executable file format used in all 32-bit versions of Windows operating systems. This option allows ClamAV to perform a deeper analysis of executable files and it\'s also required for decompression of popular executable packers such as UPX, FSG, and Petite.
00100         Default: enabled'),
00101                 ),
00102             'DetectBrokenExecutables' => array(

00130                 'title' => _TITLE2('Scan Archive'),

00136                 'info' => _HELPBOX2('Due to license issues libclamav does not support RAR 3.0 archives (only the old 2.0 format is supported). Because some users report stability problems with unrarlib it\'s disabled by default and you must uncomment the directive below to enable RAR 2.0 support.
00137         Default: disabled'),
00138                 ),
00139             'ArchiveMaxFileSize' => array(
00140                 'title' => _TITLE2('Archive Max File Size'),
00141                 'info' => _HELPBOX2('The options below protect your system against Denial of Service attacks using archive bombs.
00142 
00143         Files in archives larger than this limit won\'t be scanned.
00144         Value of 0 disables the limit.
00145         Default: 10M'),

00148                 'title' => _TITLE2('Archive Max Recursion'),
00149                 'info' => _HELPBOX2('Nested archives are scanned recursively, e.g. if a Zip archive contains a RAR file, all files within it will also be scanned. This options specifies how deep the process should be continued.
00150         Value of 0 disables the limit.
00151         Default: 8'),
00152                 ),
00153             'ArchiveMaxFiles' => array(
00154                 'title' => _TITLE2('Archive Max Files'),
00155                 'info' => _HELPBOX2('Number of files to be scanned within an archive.
00156         Value of 0 disables the limit.
00157         Default: 1000'),
00158                 ),
00159             'ArchiveMaxCompressionRatio' => array(
00160                 'title' => _TITLE2('Archive Max Compression Ratio'),
00161                 'info' => _HELPBOX2('If a file in an archive is compressed more than ArchiveMaxCompressionRatio times it will be marked as a virus (Oversized.ArchiveType, e.g. Oversized.Zip)
00162         Value of 0 disables the limit.
00163         Default: 250'),
00164                 ),
00165             'ArchiveLimitMemoryUsage' => array(
00166                 'title' => _TITLE2('Archive Limit Memory Usage'),
00167                 'info' => _HELPBOX2('Use slower but memory efficient decompression algorithm.
00168         Only affects the bzip2 decompressor.
00169         Default: disabled'),
00170                 ),
00171             'ArchiveBlockEncrypted' => array(
00172                 'title' => _TITLE2('Archive Block Encrypted'),
00173                 'info' => _HELPBOX2('Mark encrypted archives as viruses (Encrypted.Zip, Encrypted.RAR).
00174         Default: disabled'),
00175                 ),
00176             'ArchiveBlockMax' => array(
00177                 'title' => _TITLE2('Archive Block Max'),
00178                 'info' => _HELPBOX2('Mark archives as viruses (e.g. RAR.ExceededFileSize, Zip.ExceededFilesLimit) if ArchiveMaxFiles, ArchiveMaxFileSize, or ArchiveMaxRecursion limit is reached.
00179         Default: disabled'),
00180                 ),
00181         );
00182     }
